channel.title: Some Questions
channel.description:
Hey guys, so I'm trying to code my own server now. It's delta based. Well, I'd be happy, if you could answer me all or atleast some of these questions.
1.) How can I add more playerRights + image in game, for example, playerRights 5 with a moderator crown, or a crown which I want to add myself
2.) How can I add new Npc, items, object etc, everywhere I read "add the models", but where? o_O
3.) I downloaded a source named 'ParadiseX', and I have to use no-Ip if I want it to be online, I've searched the port but didn't find it, does anybody know where it is? :)
4.) My gs specs are glitched, when I use a spec on a npc and run away, the gfx moves with me. >.> Is there any way, that you cannot run while doing a spec or something like that?
5.) Agility is glitched at my source, you cannot see the gnome course, and when I spawn the agility objects, you cannot go over it, I could simply add, that if you click on the object, that you're getting teleported to the other side of the object, but that's sad.
6.) The passwords in the character files aren't hidden, any ideas how to change that?
7.) I want to add a TempBan/TempMute/TempIpMute/TempIpBan command, which Bans/Mutes/IpMutes/IpBans a player for 2days, any ideas?
That should be enough at first, thanks guys! :) I'm happy to be a part of the Mopar-Scape community now. :)

item.title: Some Questions
item.dc:creator: @Ferity Ferity
item.description:
@Ferity wrote:

Hey guys,
so I’m trying to code my own server now.
It’s delta based.
Well, I’d be happy, if you could answer me all or atleast some of these questions.

1.) How can I add more playerRights + image in game, for example, playerRights 5 with a moderator crown, or a crown which I want to add myself

2.) How can I add new Npc, items, object etc, everywhere I read “add the models”, but where? o_O

3.) I downloaded a source named ‘ParadiseX’, and I have to use no-Ip if I want it to be online, I’ve searched the port but didn’t find it, does anybody know where it is?

4.) My gs specs are glitched, when I use a spec on a npc and run away, the gfx moves with me. >.>
Is there any way, that you cannot run while doing a spec or something like that?

5.) Agility is glitched at my source, you cannot see the gnome course, and when I spawn the agility objects, you cannot go over it, I could simply add, that if you click on the object, that you’re getting teleported to the other side of the object, but that’s sad.

6.) The passwords in the character files aren’t hidden, any ideas how to change that?

7.) I want to add a TempBan/TempMute/TempIpMute/TempIpBan command, which Bans/Mutes/IpMutes/IpBans a player for 2days, any ideas?

That should be enough at first, thanks guys!
I’m happy to be a part of the Mopar-Scape community now.
